activations.description: Holds all key activations/deactivations a user has successfully completed

iat.description: integer representation of time (seconds since epoch)

ip.description: the ip address of the client that did the activation

key.description: internal id(pk) of the key that was activated

keyId.description: public id of the key that was activated

type.description: the type of event, ACTIVATE or DEACTIVATE

apiKey.description: Contains the AWS API key for the user to access nokamai api, etc. Created at activation time

id.description: the internal aws id of the api key

key.description: the key itself which will be submitted in the request body of a nokamai api request

name.description: the name of the key, should be 'CapsuleAIO|' followed by the user's id

bind.description: contains the current 'bind': an instance of Capsule AIO being bound to an activated user

ip.description: the ip address that was used for the bind: the bind is only valid for access from this ip

userKey.description: the user's public key that was generated by the client at the time of the bind. Used to encrypt data sent to user

binds.description: contains all binds, current and historical, that have ever been created by the user

iat.description: integer representation of time (seconds since epoch)

ip.description: the ip address that was used for the bind: the bind is only valid for access from this ip

key.description: the internal id of the key that was used for the bind

keyId.description: the public id of the key that was used for the bind

type.description: the type of event, BIND or UNBIND

userKey.description: the user's public key that was generated by the client at the time of the bind. Used to encrypt data sent to user

discord.description: the discord user object, contains all the information about the discord account for the user that was retrieved during the oauth2 process

avatar.description: the user's avatar ID for retrieving from the discord CDN

discriminator.description: the 4 digit discriminator at the end of a user's discord id

email.description: the email address belonging to the user (most current

id.description: the user's discord ID, should also be the same as their user id

verified.description: if the user's discord account is verified or not

discord_emails.description: All email addresses that have been associated with the user's discord account

discord_usernames.description: All usernames that have been associated with the user's discord account

id.description: the ID (range key) of the user. Should be the same as their discord ID

key.description: internal key (pk) of Capsule AIO key used for activation, if user is currently activated

keyId.description: Capsule AIO (public) key used for activation, if user is currently activated

oauth2.description: oauth2 object returned by discord after user login

type.description: The type of database object, for a user entry should always be 'user'
